description: This is a React component implementing a user authentication page with login, signup, and password reset functionalities, integrating with Supabase backend services.

methods.name: AuthPage()
methods.description: Main React component managing user authentication UI and logic.

methods.name: mapAuthError
methods.description: Helper function to translate raw authentication errors into user-friendly messages.

methods.name: switchMode
methods.description: Switches between login, signup, and reset password modes.

methods.name: doLogin
methods.description: Performs login using email and password via Supabase.

methods.name: doSignup
methods.description: Performs user registration via Supabase with password validation.

methods.name: doReset
methods.description: Sends a password reset email via Supabase.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, executing login, signup, or reset actions.

methods.name: renderPasswordHelpers
methods.description: Renders password requirement hints during signup.
